name.markdownDescription:
#### Server Name

---

The name of the dedicated server as it appears in the server list.

 - Default: `"Enshrouded Server"`

password.markdownDescription:
#### Server Password (DEPRECATED)

---

⚠️ Do not use this setting, as it may be removed in a future update.

Prior to the release of server roles, servers had one global password.

Instead, set role-specific passwords in the `userGroups` section.

saveDirectory.markdownDescription:
#### Save Directory

---

Directory path where the world save files are stored.

Default: `"./savegame"`

logDirectory.markdownDescription:
#### Log Directory

---

Directory path where log files are stored.

Default: `"./logs"`

ip.markdownDescription:
#### IP Address

---

IP address the server binds to. `0.0.0.0` binds to all available interfaces.

Default: `"0.0.0.0"`

queryPort.markdownDescription:
#### Query Port

---

Port used for server queries.

- Minimum: `1`

 - Maximum: `65535`

Default: `15637`

slotCount.markdownDescription:
#### Slot Count

---

Maximum number of player slots.

- Minimum: `1`

 - Maximum: `16`

Default: `16`

tags.markdownDescription:
#### Server Tags

---

A list of tags to describe the server in the server browser.

 - Example: `["Exploration", "Hardcore"]`

voiceChatMode.markdownDescription:
#### Voice Chat Mode

---

Mode of voice chat communication.

Options:

 - `"Proximity"` - Only players near each other can hear voice chat.

 - `"Global"` - All players can hear voice chat regardless of distance.

Default: `"Proximity"`

Current Setting:
markdownEnumDescriptions: Only players near each other can hear voice chat.
All players can hear voice chat regardless of distance.

enableVoiceChat.markdownDescription:
#### Voice Chat

---

Enables or disables voice chat.

 - Default: `false`

enableTextChat.markdownDescription:
#### Text Chat

---

Enables or disables text chat.

 - Default: `false`

gameSettingsPreset.markdownDescription:
#### Predefined Game Difficulty

---

Options:

 - `"Default"` - The Default difficulty setting configures all values to default. It is the direct continuation of how Enshrouded was configured up until update 0.7.3.0 and is the recommended setting for first-time players.

 - `"Relaxed"` - The Relaxed preset reduces the amount of enemies and provides players with more resources and loot. This mode targets players who are most interested in base-building and light-hearted adventuring.

 - `"Hard"` - The Hard preset increases the amount of enemies and makes them more aggressive to give players a tougher combat experience.

 - `"Survival"` - The Survival preset is for those who seek some punishment with additional survival mechanics on top of more aggressive enemies.

 - `"Custom"` - When Custom is selected, it allows custom values in the `gameSettings` section to take effect.

 - Default: `"Default"`

Current Setting:
markdownEnumDescriptions: More enemies and tougher combat plus survival mechanics.

gameSettings.markdownDescription:
#### Customized Game Settings

---

Server will use these values when the `gameSettingsPreset` is set to `Custom`.

playerHealthFactor.markdownDescription:
#### Player Health

---

Scales the max health for players.

In-game, the factor is represented by a percentage.

 - Minimum: `0.25`

 - Maximum: `4`

Default: `1`

playerManaFactor.markdownDescription:
#### Player Mana

---

Scales the max mana for players.

In-game, the factor is represented by a percentage.

 - Minimum: `0.25`

 - Maximum: `4`

Default: `1`

playerStaminaFactor.markdownDescription:
#### Player Stamina

---

Scales the max stamina for players.

In-game, the factor is represented by a percentage.

 - Minimum: `0.25`

 - Maximum: `4`

Default: `1`

playerBodyHeatFactor.markdownDescription:
#### Cold Resistance

---

Scales the max amount of available body heat in the player.

The higher the factor, the longer the player can stay in very cold areas before hypothermia sets in.

Options:

 - Low: `0`

 - Default: `1`

 - High: `1.5`

 - Max: `2`

Current Setting:

playerDivingTimeFactor.markdownDescription:
#### Diving Time

---

Modifies the initial amount of oxygen for players and therefore the time available underwater.

 - Minimum: `0.5`

 - Maximum: `2`

Default: `1`

enableDurability.markdownDescription:
#### Weapon Durability

---

When `false`, weapons don't break anymore.

enableStarvingDebuff.markdownDescription:
#### Hunger and Starvation

---

When `true`, enables hunger and starvation.

During starvation, the player loses health periodically until death if no food or drink is consumed.

foodBuffDurationFactor.markdownDescription:
#### Food Buff Duration

---

Scales food buff durations. In-game, the factor is represented by a percentage.

 - Minimum: `0.5`

 - Maximum: `2`

Default: `1`

fromHungerToStarving.markdownDescription:
#### Hungry State Duration

---

This setting controls the length of the hungry state before the starving sets in.

The unit is nanoseconds. In-game, the time is displayed in minutes.

 - Minimum: `300000000000` (5 minutes)

 - Maximum: `1200000000000` (20 minutes)

Default: `600000000000` (10 minutes)

shroudTimeFactor.markdownDescription:
#### Shroud Time Duration Modifier

---

Scales how long player characters can remain within the Shroud.

In-game, the factor is represented by a percentage.

 - Minimum: `0.5`

 - Maximum: `2`

Default: `1`

tombstoneMode.markdownDescription:
#### Tombstone Mode

---

Players can either keep or lose all items from their backpack when dying.

Lost items are stored in a tombstone and can be recovered there.

Options:

 - `"AddBackpackMaterials"` - Only drop materials (default).

 - `"Everything"` - Drop all backpack contents.

 - `"NoTombstone"` - Keep all backpack contents. Don't drop a tombstone.

Current Setting:
markdownEnumDescriptions: Keep all backpack contents. Don't drop a tombstone.

enableGliderTurbulences.markdownDescription:
#### Glider Turbulence

---

When `false`, glider flight will not be affected by air turbulence, just as in previous versions of the game.

weatherFrequency.markdownDescription:
#### Weather Frequency

---

This setting allows defining how often new weather phenomena appear in the game world.

Options:

 - `"Disabled"` - No weather changes.

 - `"Rare"` - Weather changes are rare.

 - `"Normal"` - Normal weather changes. (Default)

 - `"Often"` - Frequent weather changes.

miningDamageFactor.markdownDescription:
#### Mining Effectiveness

---

This scales mining damage and terraforming.

A higher value means increased terraforming and more yield of resources per hit.

In-game, the factor is represented by a percentage.

 - Minimum: `0.5`

 - Maximum: `2`

Default: `1`

plantGrowthSpeedFactor.markdownDescription:
#### Plant Growth Speed

---

Scales how quickly plants grow.

In-game, the factor is represented by a percentage.

 - Minimum: `0.25`

 - Maximum: `2`

Default: `1`

resourceDropStackAmountFactor.markdownDescription:
#### Resource Gain Modifier

---

Scales the amount of materials per loot stack in chests, defeated enemies, etc.

In-game, the factor is represented by a percentage.

 - Minimum: `0.25`

 - Maximum: `2`

Default: `1`

factoryProductionSpeedFactor.markdownDescription:
#### Workstation Effectiveness

---

Scales the length of production times for workshop items.

Ingame, the factor is represented by a percentage.

 - Minimum: `0.25`

 - Maximum: `2`

Default: `1`

perkUpgradeRecyclingFactor.markdownDescription:
#### Weapon Salvage Modifier

---

Scales the amount of Runes that are returned to you when salvaging upgraded weapons.

In-game, the factor is represented by a percentage.

 - Minimum: `0.25`

 - Maximum: `2`

Default: `0.5`

perkCostFactor.markdownDescription:
#### Weapon Upgrade Cost

---

Scales the amount of Runes required for upgrading weapons.

In-game, the factor is represented by a percentage.

 - Minimum: `0.25`

 - Maximum: `2`

Default: `1`

experienceCombatFactor.markdownDescription:
#### Combat Experience Modifier

---

Scales the amount of XP received through combat.

In-game, the factor is represented by a percentage.

 - Minimum: `0.25`

 - Maximum: `2`

Default: `1`

experienceMiningFactor.markdownDescription:
#### Mining Experience Modifier

---

Scales the amount of XP received by mining resources.

In-game, the factor is represented by a percentage.

 - Minimum: `0.25`

 - Maximum: `2`

Default: `1`

experienceExplorationQuestsFactor.markdownDescription:
#### Exploration Experience Modifier

---

Scales the amount of XP received by exploring and completing quests.

In-game, the factor is represented by a percentage.

 - Minimum: `0.25`

 - Maximum: `2`

Default: `1`

randomSpawnerAmount.markdownDescription:
#### Enemy Amount

---

This setting controls the amount of enemies in the world.

Options:

 - `"Few"` - Fewer enemies.

 - `"Normal"` - Normal amount of enemies. (Default)

 - `"Many"` - More enemies.

 - `"Extreme"` - A lot of enemies.

Current Setting:

aggroPoolAmount.markdownDescription:
#### Enemy Aggro Modifier

---

This setting controls how many enemies are allowed to attack at the same time.

In-game, the factor is represented by a percentage.

Options:

 - `"Few"` - Fewer enemies can attack at the same time.

 - `"Normal"` - Normal amount of enemies can attack at the same time. (Default)

 - `"Many"` - More enemies can attack at the same time.

 - `"Extreme"` - A lot of enemies can attack at the same time.

Current Setting:
markdownEnumDescriptions: Fewer enemies can attack at the same time.
Normal amount of enemies can attack at the same time.
More enemies can attack at the same time.
A lot of enemies can attack at the same time.

enemyDamageFactor.markdownDescription:
#### Enemy Damage

---

Scales all enemy damage by this value - except for bosses.

In-game, the factor is represented by a percentage.

 - Minimum: `0.25`

 - Maximum: `5`

Default: `1`

enemyHealthFactor.markdownDescription:
#### Enemy Health

---

Scales all enemy health by this value - except for bosses.

In-game, the factor is represented by a percentage.

 - Minimum: `0.25`

 - Maximum: `4`

Default: `1`

enemyStaminaFactor.markdownDescription:
#### Enemy Stun Modifier

---

Scales all enemy stamina by this value.

It will take longer to stun enemies with a higher enemy stamina. This excludes bosses.

In-game, the factor is represented by a percentage.

 - Minimum: `0.25`

 - Maximum: `2`

Default: `1`

enemyPerceptionRangeFactor.markdownDescription:
#### Enemy Perception Modifier

---

Scales how far enemies can see and hear the player. This excludes bosses.

In-game, the factor is represented by a percentage.

 - Minimum: `0.25`

 - Maximum: `2`

Default: `1`

bossDamageFactor.markdownDescription:
#### Boss Damage Modifier

---

This setting scales the damage of boss attacks.

In-game, the factor is represented by a percentage.

 - Minimum: `0.2`

 - Maximum: `5`

Default: `1`

bossHealthFactor.markdownDescription:
#### Boss Health Modifier

---

Scales all health of bosses by this value.

In-game, the factor is represented by a percentage.

 - Minimum: `0.2`

 - Maximum: `5`

Default: `1`

threatBonus.markdownDescription:
#### Enemy Attack Modifier

---

Scales the frequency of enemy attacks. This excludes bosses.

In-game, the factor is represented by a percentage.

 - Minimum: `0.25`

 - Maximum: `2`

Default: `1`

pacifyAllEnemies.markdownDescription:
#### Pacify Enemies

---

When `true`, enemies won't attack the players until they are attacked. This excludes bosses.

tamingStartleRepercussion.markdownDescription:
#### Taming Failure Repercussions

---

This setting allows defining how the game reacts when the player startles the wildlife during taming.

Progress is visualized by hearts in the game.

Options:

 - `"KeepProgress"` - Keep all hearts.

 - `"LoseSomeProgress"` - Lose some hearts.

 - `"LoseAllProgress"` - Lose all hearts.

Current Setting:

dayTimeDuration.markdownDescription:
#### Daytime

---

Scales the length of daytime. A smaller value equals shorter daytime.

The unit is nanoseconds. In-game, the time is displayed in minutes.

 - Minimum: `120000000000` (2 minutes)

 - Maximum: `3600000000000` (60 minutes)

Default: `1800000000000` (30 minutes)

nightTimeDuration.markdownDescription:
#### Nighttime

---

Scales the length of nighttime. A smaller value equals a shorter nighttime.

The unit is nanoseconds. In-game, the time is displayed in minutes.

 - Minimum: `120000000000` (2 minutes)

 - Maximum: `3600000000000` (60 minutes)

Default: `720000000000` (12 minutes)

curseModifier.markdownDescription:
#### Curse Modifier

---

This setting allows switching the Shroud curse off or modifying the chance for receiving the curse when being attacked by the corresponding enemies.

 - `"Easy"`: Turns the feature off.

 - `"Normal"`: Normal chance of receiving the curse.

 - `"Hard"`: Doubles the chance of receiving the curse.

Default: `Normal`
markdownEnumDescriptions: Normal chance of receiving the curse.
Doubles the chance of receiving the curse.

fishingDifficulty.markdownDescription:
#### Fishing Difficulty

---

This setting defines the strength of the fish during the fishing minigame. The stronger a fish is, the longer the minigame will proceed.

Default: `Normal`

userGroups.markdownDescription:
#### User Groups

---

A list of user groups with their permissions and settings.

name.markdownDescription:
#### Group Name

The name of the user group.

password.markdownDescription:
#### Group Password

The password required to log in as a member of this group.

canKickBan.markdownDescription:
#### Kick/Ban

When `true`, users in this group can kick or ban other users.

Default: `false`

canAccessInventories.markdownDescription:
#### Inventory Access

When `true`, users in this group can access chests and other containers.

Default: `false`

canEditWorld.markdownDescription:
#### World Editing

When `true`, users in this group can destroy terrain and objects outside of build areas.

Default: `false`

canEditBase.markdownDescription:
#### Base Building

When `true`, users in this group can build add/remove blocks, add/remove props, and terraform within build areas.

Default: `false`

canExtendBase.markdownDescription:
#### Flame Altars

When `true`, users in this group can add/remove/upgrade flame altars on the server.

Default: `false`

reservedSlots.markdownDescription:
#### Reserved Slots

When 1 or more reserved slots are set, the lobby will be marked as 'full' for players who try to log into the server under a different user group if it would fill up all session slots.

This allows, for example, Admins or Friends to join even if there is a high demand for slots by 'Guests'.

 - Minimum: `0`

 - Maximum: `16`

Default: `0`

bannedAccounts.markdownDescription:
#### Banned Users

---

A list of banned user entries with account details and ban information.

accountId.markdownDescription:
#### Account ID

A custom 64-bit hash (FNV-1a) representing the player's Steam account.

displayName.markdownDescription:
#### Display Name

The player's Steam account name.

characterName.markdownDescription:
#### Character Name

The player's in-game character name.

value.markdownDescription:
#### Ban Date Value

Unix timestamp (seconds) when the ban was applied.
